dict.string: - AppleScript support, including Radio control. - Added option to tune an Artist's top fans radio instead of their similar artists radio. - The Growl 'Now playing' notificiaton can be displayed at any time by hovering the mouse over the menu. - Elapsed and total track time are now included in the default track Growl display - Album art for Radio tracks is displayed if possible. - Bug fixes related to Radio track detection/display.
